headline: Analog Devices (ADI) Is Up 8.9% After Strong Q3 Earnings and Upbeat Automation Outlook - What's Changed
summary: Earlier this week, Analog Devices reported its third-quarter 2025 results, posting revenue of US$2.88 billion and net income of US$518.52 million, both up sharply from the prior year, and declared a US$0.99 per share dividend to be paid on September 16, 2025. Alongside strong earnings and upbeat outlook, management highlighted growth across industrial, automotive, communications, and consumer markets, while continuing share buybacks and investments in advanced robotics and AI...
